instruction.en: Turn into Management Mode (remove cover), hit button 1 and confirm with * (Star Key)

hint.en: After this time a CLOSE command is sent to the controlled door lock. On default no CLOSE command is sent assuming that the strike lock has its own timeout set

label.en: Ring Button Press Basic Command OFF Timeout

hint.en: After this time the Door Bell will receive an OF command regardless of the actuall button is pressed or not
This value is sent into Association Group 3 when the door bell button is pressed.
This value is sent into Association Group 3 when the door bell button is released or the timeout has reached.

label.en: Central Scene ID for User Codes

hint.en: This parameter defines if different user codes shall cause individual or similar scene ID sent to the main controller.
This parameter defines if the internal buzzer shall be used to confirm button presses.
